QuestData.Title: A Debilitating Sickness
QuestData.Description: It is good that you've offered to aid us, $n. Our grunts have fallen sick from drinking contaminated water and I'm missing an ingredient to produce a healing salve. I'm in need of a rare mushroom called drycap.$B$BOur foremost orders are to keep our location secret and not risk being spotted while looking for it, or I would go myself. The only place in Hellfire Peninsula where drycap grows is a cave at the Great Fissure, south of here.$B$BBe extremely careful if you choose to seek it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Earthcaller Ryga at Mag'har Post in Hellfire Peninsula wants you to bring her 1 Drycap Mushroom from a cave inside the Great Fissure.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you obtain the mushroom I need, $N?
QuestData.RewardText: Gorkan said good things about you. They're all turning out to be true.$B$BThanks for your help.
